memberdef.name: BWMachined

detaileddescription.para: Constructor.
Destructor.
This method reads the tags from both bwmachined.conf and bigworld.conf.

Set PID path read in from command line arguments.
Writes this machine's process table to disk so it can be restarted under the same state.
Writes this machine's process table to a state file.

parameterdescription.para: The filename to write the process table to.

detaileddescription.para: Reads a process table from disk.
Loads and verifies a previously saved state file into the process table.

parameterdescription.para: The filename to write the process table to.

detaileddescription.para: Close all of the open sockets owned by this BWMachined object. This is called from inside startProcess() to ensure that child processes don't hold onto these sockets.
Reads a packet from the provided input stream and either delays the packet handling if staggered, otherwise immediately passes it to the handlePacket method.
The stream is consumed as far as the MGMPacket::read method consumes a stream, which is determined by the packet length as indicated in the stream. This happens on both failure and success.

parameterdescription.para: The connection wrapper which received the stream and is to be used for sending replies
The received data in the form of a BinaryIStream

simplesect.para: true if the packet can be read off the connection wrapper, otherwise false

Stop the BWMachined main processing loop, thus shutting it down.
Broadcasts the provided mgm to the cluster.
Broadcasts the provided packet to the cluster.
Broadcasts the provided wrapped packet to the cluster.
Creates a BroadcastManager via the network node.
The BroadcastManager's subclass will be specific to the type of NetworkNode.

parameterdescription.para: The BroadcastWrapperMessage that the new BroadcastManager sends and handles responses for.
The connection wrapper to handle sending responses.
The table to update with sequence number references to the new BroadcastManager.

simplesect.para: A pointer to a BroadcastManager object. This memory must be managed by the caller.

This method invokes the handler for each message in the packet.
Processes a received MGM and adds MGM responses to the replies param.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the connection wrapper which received the message and can be used to send replies over
The source address that received the message
The mgm packet to append replies to

detaileddescription.para: Read the tags from specified configuration file. No need to close input file.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the file handle of a config file.

simplesect.para: true if file parsing was successful, false otherwise.
